overview: It's an honor for any model to be included in the annual wall calendar for 'Skintight' magazine, but the real pleasure comes from your time spent on the sensual set of this X-rated photoshoot. From award-winning director Trenton Ducati and celebrated screenwriter Ben Rush, this bareback feature follows famed fashion photographer Cade Maddox as he manages a shoot that brings together nine of the very best and horniest models in the business. As you can see with these insatiable models and this hung photographer, nothing 'Skintight' stays on for long!
title: Skintight
